metadata.title: CVE-2018-8098 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: Integer overflow in the index.c:read_entry() function while decompressing a compressed prefix length in libgit2 before v0.26.2 allows an attacker to cause a denial of service (out-of-bounds read) via a crafted repository index file.

notes.note: msalvatore> Downgrading to low: "As the index is never transferred via the network, exploitation requires an attacker to have access to the local repository."

criterions.comment: libgit2 package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.27.4+dfsg.1-0.1').
